document_data.name: Halfole
document_data.mainbody: '''Halfoles''' were a style of building prevalent in [[Luiren]] that were used by [[halfling]]s.
document_data.Structure: Halfoles were located underground. Their size and layout varied greatly. Halfoles were used for both domestic and commercial structures.
document_data.History: Most of the rich halflings of Luiren preferred to live in a halfole compared to any opulent above-ground residence.
